dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Seventy-five million dollars? Seventy-five million? For Sofia Vergara?

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The World's Highest-Paid Actresses 2018 1. Sofia Vergara Earnings: $42.5 million

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, um, that's what the article says, Host_A. She, like, totally dwarfs her peers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, um, that's what the article says, Host_A. She, like, totally dwarfs her peers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The World's Highest-Paid Actresses 2018 1. Sofia Vergara Earnings: $42.5 million

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Dwarfs? That's almost triple Kaley Cuoco's earnings. How is that even, uh, remotely real?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dwarfs? That's almost triple Kaley Cuoco's earnings. How is that even, uh, remotely real?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sofia Vergara Her giant haul, which clocks in at 73% more than second-ranked Kaley Cuoco's $24.5 million, leads this year's ranking of the small screen's top earners.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, you know, it's not just her Modern Family salary. Over seventy percent of her income is from, like, endorsements and other ventures.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, you know, it's not just her Modern Family salary. Over seventy percent of her income is from, like, endorsements and other ventures.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Modern Family star reigns supreme thanks not only to her salary from her role on the hit ABC comedy but also to a slew of endorsements and lucrative licensing deals, which make up nearly half of her payday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Seventy percent? Seventy percent from what? Haute couture on Home Shopping Network? Are you serious right now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seventy percent? Seventy percent from what? Haute couture on Home Shopping Network? Are you serious right now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, it's, uh, haute couture for HSN. And she's got a lucrative real estate partnership, a new branded cruise line...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, it's, uh, haute couture for H S N. And she's got a lucrative real estate partnership, a new branded cruise line...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Among them: coffee maker SharkNinja Coffee and furniture chain Rooms To Go.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A cruise line? And her manager wants to do space tourism? This sounds like, uh, fan fiction, not actual earnings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A cruise line? And her manager wants to do space tourism? This sounds like, uh, fan fiction, not actual earnings.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our attention is on the people watching Modern Family and how to appeal to them outside of the show, too, Luis Balaguer, Vergaras manager and business partner, told Forbes in 2016.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's, um, what Luis Balaguer stated. He's her manager.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's, um, what Luis Balaguer stated. He's her manager.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our attention is on the people watching Modern Family and how to appeal to them outside of the show, too, Luis Balaguer, Vergaras manager and business partner, told Forbes in 2016.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Meanwhile, Kaley Cuoco's just getting peanuts from Big Bang Theory, apparently? And they even took pay cuts for guest stars, like Jennifer Aniston?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Meanwhile, Kaley Cuoco's just getting peanuts from Big Bang Theory, apparently? And they even took pay cuts for guest stars, like Jennifer Aniston?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Cuoco and her male co-stars took a pay cut, from an estimated $1 million an episode to $900,000 an episode, in an effort to free up cash for ranking newcomers Melissa Rauch (No. 6, $12 million) and Mayim Bialik (No. 6, $12 million).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, um, it says they wanted to give opportunity to newcomers, and the cast got a bonus for, like, extended time off to relax.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, um, it says they wanted to give opportunity to newcomers, and the cast got a bonus for, like, extended time off to relax.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Cuoco and her male co-stars took a pay cut, from an estimated $1 million an episode to $900,000 an episode, in an effort to free up cash for ranking newcomers Melissa Rauch (No. 6, $12 million) and Mayim Bialik (No. 6, $12 million).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A bonus to relax. Right. And Ellen Pompeo's raking in $30 million from Grey's Anatomy plus a 'medical tech startup'?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A bonus to relax. Right. And Ellen Pompeo's raking in thirty dollars million from Grey's Anatomy plus a 'medical tech startup'?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: She's, uh, leveraging her long tenure, you know? Upfront fees, backend, producer credits on Station 19.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: She's, uh, leveraging her long tenure, you know? Upfront fees, backend, producer credits on Station nineteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Playing Meredith Grey for 15 seasons on Shonda Rhimes' Grey's Anatomy has allowed her to negotiate for a hefty upfront fee, a cut of the backend and a producer fee on spinoff Station 19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And then you have Mariska Hargitay and Julie Bowen, who, uh, forego endorsements. Smart move, clearly, when the other stuff is just... this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then you have Mariska Hargitay and Julie Bowen, who, uh, forego endorsements. Smart move, clearly, when the other stuff is just... this.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rounding out the top five are Law & Order: SVU's Mariska Hargitay (No. 4, $13 million) and Modern Family's Julie Bowen (No. 5, $12.5 million). Both forgo endorsements and instead make their cash on screen.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, overall, the top ten, they hit, like, $200 million. It's a significant jump from last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, overall, the top ten, they hit, like, two hundred dollars million. It's a significant jump from last year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together, the world's 10 highest-paid TV actresses earned a combined $168.5 million between June 1, 2017, and June 1, 2018, up from $156.5 million in the same period last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Significant. Yeah. So the takeaway is, stop acting, start selling cruises and, uh, dabble in space travel. Got it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Significant. Yeah. So the takeaway is, stop acting, start selling cruises and, uh, dabble in space travel. Got it.
